text: Nancy B. Jackson (March 1, 1956 â€“ January 3, 2022) was an American chemist. She was known for her works about alternative fuels. She was president of the American Chemical Society in 2011. Jackson died on 3 January 2022, in Albuquerque, New Mexico at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American chemists Category:Scientists from Wisconsin Category:Scientists from New Mexico Category:People from Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:People from Eau Claire, Wisconsin
